subject: [junit] JUnit &&HttpUnit
msgSnippet: This a very simple question. Does anyone know how to apply JUnit and HttpUnit to test the web server response .Now I can use JUnit to test,but I don t know how
messageBody:
This a very simple question.
Does anyone know how to apply JUnit and HttpUnit to test the web server response .Now I can use JUnit to test,but I don't know how to combine JUnit with HttpUnit.
Could you show me some light on using it from the very beginning.
Could you give me some example of it if possible.
Thank you in advance.

Gilyy
